description:
Be Priceless is a non-profit educational organization that aims to empower disadvantaged children and their communities to strengthen well-being and safety. We believe in a more equitable world where no child is left behind.

We are seeking a passionate candidate to be the Operations Manager who has extensive experienced in business and partnership development, and program management for non-profit organization or education entrepreneurship sector in Hong Kong.               

Be Priceless is growing well and the Operations Manager will have a key role in driving the development of the programs, resources, as well as partnerships with trusted NGOs, schools, community groups and members.

We develop in depth evidence and best practice-based educational programs to build capacity, mindsets and practices of children, caregivers and care service providers to promote personal development, well-being (physical, mental and social health) and risk reduction (against violence, exploitation, health risks, disasters, etc).  

We work by shared leadership and community-wide collaboration to create and deliver an impactful educational program. Our team comes from diverse technical and community backgrounds. For more information, please visit www.bepriceless.org

·     Assist the founder with internal processes and monitor the growth of a transformative educational program that empowers and engages an all-of-city approach to strengthening children, youth and families' well-being and safety.

·     Coordinate and collaborate with dynamic team of multicultural experts from diverse fields, community members, child and youth in empowering ways.

·      Positive, collaborative, nurturing organizational culture

-      Direct report to founder 


·      Develop and implement business plans to generate resources and enhance outcomes and impacts.

·      Facilitate pursuit of opportunities for development and funding for Be Priceless by contributing to grant proposal development.

·      Drive and strengthen organization culture, mechanisms and actions for producing impact, collaboration, coordination, communication, accountability, quality control, team and program operations management.

·      Drive and manage all team operations and coordination.

·      Coordinate the planning, development, implementation, assessments and reporting of all educational and other organizational projects

·      Drive the child safeguarding and protection policy, protocol, monitoring and reporting mechanisms.

·      Work with and support the team, including optimizing operational aspects of the program.

·      Lead the initiatives to promote learning, well-being and safety of the team and the stakeholders we serve

·      Drive and strengthen community engagement

·      Develop strong program management to promote nurturing organization culture, effective impact achievement, multisectoral collaboration, accountability, including tools to strengthen the organization structure, process, work and future development;

·      Create and upkeep processes and team management that facilitate internal and external communication and collaborations from online tools, in-person participation, ongoing updates, to team and partners engagement;
